name: Action Rush
description: Simple racing game. Our goal is to reach the exit by coming from the top of simple obstacles in 6 different maps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any 1 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 430 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 540 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
